body: i can't join avicus anymore, it keeps saying unknown host. can anybody help me.
body_tagged: i can't join avicus anymore, it keeps saying unknown host. can anybody help me.
title: help!

replies.body: You may be using old Avicus IP's. Try using avic.us.
replies.body_tagged: You may be using old Avicus IP's. Try using avic.us.

replies.body:
Is it just Avicus that you cannot connect to?
If you cannot connect to any server, that means that it might be your internet.
If not, try doing what rile and Pete said.
replies.body_tagged:
Is it just Avicus that you cannot connect to?
If you cannot connect to any server, that means that it might be your internet.
If not, try doing what rile and Pete said.

replies.body: It's not his internet...over the past week the server and forums have crashed multiple times
replies.body_tagged: It's not his internet...over the past week the server and forums have crashed multiple times

replies.body:
Glad you solved your problem! :D
I'll archive this to prevent any further spam..

replies.body:
Question has been answered.
To connect just use avic.us instead of the old ip.
Locking.
